Reviews.Title: Awesome Product, Great Value for the Bucks
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: The battery and charger arrived in 4 days after placing the order, the batteries are 1800mah which last longer than the original battery that came with the camera.The charger has a green and red light to indicate when the battery has been fully charged. Awesome price for a great battery and charger.  Thank you Seller for providing such a great product with a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Mike_P of S.D.
Reviews.Content: No disappointments here, batteries fit and look like OEM and work perfectly. This is much better than plugging in the camera to charge up the batteries. I did a lot of research before buying this particular one, and it is a great value for the money!

Reviews.Title: Seems like a good product a an excellent price
Reviews.Author: Stuart M
Reviews.Content: Delivery was amazingly quick; the batteries and charger were delivered within two days.  I immediately charged the batteries and tried them in the camera.  Both batteries charged right up and work perfectly in the camera.  Haven't taken enough pictures yet to know how long they last compared to the OEM battery.

Reviews.Title: Sony Action Cam Battery
Reviews.Author: T. Harris
Reviews.Content: These are great drop in replacements for the Sony ActionCam line.  They look the same as the Sony battery.  I can't say how they perform because I haven't really used them much yet, so I can't say if it has the same capacity as the Sony, but it did work out of the box and both batteries were fairly full upon arriaval (per the meter on the camera).  Charger works well with these and the original Sony Battery, which is a plus as you can't use the camera and charge with the stock/factory setup.  The external charge is a nice bonus.I'll update when I've had a chance to fully use these and see if they preform as hoped.  So far, so good.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Gregory D. Shamblin
Reviews.Content: very prompt delivery exactly as expected. so far everything working perfectly. i was under a deadline and it is nice to know you can count on Amazon to get it here when promised.

Reviews.Title: it works.
Reviews.Author: Techy A.
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my new SONY Cybershot DSC-HX50V camera. It works perfectly. The charger works as it should be.No issues so far.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I ordered
Reviews.Author: Jesus Salinas
Reviews.Content: I'm a sucker for great deals and this order is just that. Came in on time, packaging was solid, and everything is as described.

Reviews.Title: Both batteries "Exhausted"
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: First battery "Exhausted" after two charges. No longer holds a charge.Didn't bother me because I really only needed one spare.Three months later, and both do not hold a charge.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery
Battery Specs: 1800 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Sony NP-BX1 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1800 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery for Sony Cyber-shot HX50V Digital Camera and Sony NP-BX1
